charge_interval_frequency.description: Frequency at which the product can be charged or renewed.

collection_id.description: Identifier for the collection to which the product belongs.

created_at.description: Date and time when the product was created.

cutoff_day_of_month.description: Specific day of the month when charging period ends.

cutoff_day_of_week.description: Specific day of the week when charging period ends.

discount_amount.description: Amount of discount applied to the product.

discount_type.description: Type of discount applied (e.g., percentage or fixed amount).

expire_after_specific_number_of_charges.description: Number of charges after which the product expires.

handle.description: Unique identifier used by the system for the product.

modifiable_properties.description: Properties of the product that can be modified by the user.

order_day_of_month.description: Specific day of the month for placing orders.

order_day_of_week.description: Specific day of the week for placing orders.

order_interval_unit.description: Unit of interval for ordering (e.g., days, weeks).

shopify_product_id.description: Identifier of the product in the Shopify platform.

storefront_purchase_options.description: Purchase options available on the storefront.

title.description: Title or name of the product.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the product was last updated.
